abstract: Several top officers at BP, including its chief executive, Robert W. Dudley, won’t get 2010 bonuses because of the massive oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
snippet: Several top officers at BP, including its chief executive, Robert W. Dudley, won’t get 2010 bonuses because of the massive oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
lead_paragraph: BP said Thursday that its chief executive, Robert W. Dudley, and his predecessor, Anthony B. Hayward, would not get a bonus for 2010 because of the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.

headline.main: BP Denies Bonus for Chief, Citing Oil Spill
